markdown:
**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 141 1.1 **Tradition** [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Spell Lists** [Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5) **Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 500 feet **Area** 15-foot radius, 80-foot tall cylinder **Saving Throw** Reflex **Duration** sustained up to 1 minute --- Powerful winds coalesce into a devastating tornado. You can Cast this Spell only if you are outside or the ceiling is 80 feet or higher. All squares in the whirlwind are difficult terrain. All creatures in the area take 5d10 bludgeoning damage as powerful winds and debris buffet them, with a Reflex save. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move the whirlwind up to 30 feet in a straight line. Each creature the whirlwind moves through takes the damage, also with a Reflex save. A creature can be affected by a _whirlwind_ only once per round. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and rises 10 feet into the air. If it doesn't have a fly Speed, the creature gains one equal to its Speed until it either reaches the ground or ceases to be in the whirlwind's area, potentially falling when the spell ends or when it leaves the area.
**Critical Failure** As failure, except the creature takes double damage and rises 20 feet into the air. --- **Heightened (+1)** Increase the bludgeoning damage by 1d10.
name: Whirlwind
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 15-foot radius, 80-foot tall cylinder

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Reflex

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Create a moving tornado to damage creatures and raise them into the air.
</summary>
summary: Create a moving tornado to damage creatures and raise them into the air.
summary_markdown: Create a moving tornado to damage creatures and raise them into the air.
text: Whirlwind Source Secrets of Magic pg. 141 1.1 Tradition Primal Spell Lists Elemental Cast Three Actions material, somatic, verbal Range 500 feet Area 15-foot radius, 80-foot tall cylinder Saving Throw Reflex Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- Powerful winds coalesce into a devastating tornado. You can Cast this Spell only if you are outside or the ceiling is 80 feet or higher. All squares in the whirlwind are difficult terrain. All creatures in the area take 5d10 bludgeoning damage as powerful winds and debris buffet them, with a Reflex save. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move the whirlwind up to 30 feet in a straight line. Each creature the whirlwind moves through takes the damage, also with a Reflex save. A creature can be affected by a whirlwind only once per round. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature takes half damage. Failure The creature takes full damage and rises 10 feet into the air. If it doesn't have a fly Speed, the creature gains one equal to its Speed until it either reaches the ground or ceases to be in the whirlwind's area, potentially falling when the spell ends or when it leaves the area. Critical Failure As failure, except the creature takes double damage and rises 20 feet into the air. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the bludgeoning damage by 1d10.
